snippet: A new job title — chief of laboratory safety — will be created at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the agency announced Wednesday.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announces creation of position of chief of laboratory safety in response to series of lab accidents, most recent of which might have exposed scientist to Ebola virus.
lead_paragraph: A new job title — chief of laboratory safety — will be created at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the agency announced Wednesday.
